title: 20 Minute Guided Meditation For The Heart ❤ | Self Love, Inner Wisdom & Compassion
description:
Listen to this 20 minute guided meditation each day and explore the love and compassion within our hearts to find a state of relaxation and inner peace. 
🚨 Check out our NEW youtube channel dedicated EXCLUSIVELY to Meditations 🚨 https://flow.bohobeautiful.life/BohoBeautifulMind-

By letting go of any negative, stagnant energy and focusing on the light and love within us, we will find protection from any external disturbances. Using our breath as an anchor in this present moment. 

We will hold space for any emotions that have been holding us back, observing them with compassion and kindness and letting them go, allowing space for positivity and grounding. Finding deep clarity and sense of connection, and remembering that we are the light.

Mantra: Through love, I return home to my heart. I am loved, supported and guided.

Enjoy this moment of mindfulness.

Instructor: Juliana Spicoluk
Location: Vancouver Island 🇨🇦

channelDescription:
Free yoga videos for the digital yogi. 
Specializing in content highlighting fitness, pilates, vegan food, guided meditations and thoughtful blogs for conscious and mindful living. Boho Beautiful is the creation and beating heart of both Juliana and Mark Spicoluk.

If you are new to the Boho Beautiful family, be ready to experience everything from beginner and intermediate to yin, hatha, ashtanga and so much more.


Your Decisions Today Will Define Your Tomorrow.

comments: If you happen to read this, know that you are capable of creating your own happiness. Embrace your true self and focus on positivity. Spread love and kindness, and watch as the universe brings more of it back to you. You got this!🦋🦋🦋

Thank you! I'm from Ukraine and I started to follow your meditations when the war came into my life. It really helped me to find sense again and to feel alive, and it still helps. Thank you for your job and your support ❤ Дякую
This meditation is just wonderful. Especially when Juliana said "I love you" at the end, I was very overwhelmed. 💜

As someone who wasn’t nurtured at all as a child and dealt with a lot of abuse. These past few months I have finally started working on loving myself and nurturing myself, being kind to myself. I broke down, this meditation was so beautiful. Thank you for this. Wishing everyone luck on their personal journeys ❤

Thank you so much for this meditation. Tears started rolling as I pronounced the words “Through love, I return home to my heart…” in the mantra. I am not a perfect human being. I have caused hurt to others as I was hurt in the inside. Now realizing that my pain inside is only the Universe letting me know that I deserve love. Thank you for this beautiful reminder.
